bug.author: advaitjain
bug.summary: layering check mismatch between internal and open-source TFLM bazel builds
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/orgs/tensorflow/teams/micro>@tensorflow/micro</denchmark-link>
The Google-internal bazel builds have layering checks turned on while the open-source builds do not. This results in PRs passing external checks but then failing internally (see <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/46242>#46242</denchmark-link> as an example). If we can have the same behavior in the OSS bazel build then there will be one less discrepancy between the internal and open-source builds.

comments.comment:
